text: John Joseph Herron AO (4 September 1932 — 25 February 2019),Biography for Herron, the Hon. John Joseph, Parlinfo – biographies, Parliament of Australia, retrieved 13 September 2009Ferguson, Richard. 2019. "Howard-Era Aboriginal Affairs Minister John Herron Dies at 86." The Australian, Feb 27, 2. was an Australian politician, ambassador and surgeon. Herron was a Liberal member of the Australian Senate from 1990 to 2002, representing Queensland. From 1996 to 2001 he was the Minister for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Affairs. From 2002 to 2006 he was the Australian Ambassador to Ireland and the Holy See.Department of Foreign Affairs: 28 February 2019. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Australian Roman Catholics Category:Ambassadors of Australia Category:Politicians from Queensland
title: John Herron
